Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback is {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

Game.message_nonWin:
NOT A WINNER
BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR TRYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

landscape.text1: Reveal a Green Present to win the corresponding prize.
landscape.text3: Reveal Green Presents in all positions of a column to win the corresponding prize multiplier.

portrait.text1: Reveal a Green Present to win the corresponding prize.
portrait.text3:
Reveal Green Presents in all positions of a column
to win the corresponding prize multiplier.

landscape.text1: Reveal a Golden Present to trigger the Bonus.
landscape.text3:
Select tiles to reveal colored symbols or multipliers.
Fill a meter with 4 of the same colored symbol to win the corresponding prize.

Starting from 1x, the multiplier meter moves by the multiplier value revealed.
The multiplier value highlighted when a meter is filled is applied to the meter prize.

portrait.text1: Reveal a Golden Present to trigger the Bonus.
portrait.text3:
Select tiles to reveal colored symbols or multipliers.
Fill a meter with 4 of the same colored symbol to win the corresponding prize.

Starting from 1x, the multiplier meter moves by the multiplier value revealed. The multiplier value highlighted when a meter is filled is applied to the meter prize.

Game.infoBarText: WINNINGS ARE MULTIPLIED FOR A COMPLETED COLUMN
Game.collectorMeterInfoText:
Reveal tiles in search of Symbols, win the prize of the first completed meter!

Accumulate multipliers for bigger wins!
